required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Trial: Epic Surgical Discharge Order Set With Medication Defaults

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective pilot trial to evaluate a new electronic medical record based intervention to improve discharges after surgery. The investigators hypothesize that standard discharge medications after surgery will help to optimize opioid prescribing and potentially decrease healthcare utilization in the first 30 days after surgery.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a 2-arm parallel randomized trial comparing a new electronic medical record (EMR)-based intervention to usual care after surgery. All patients will receive their usual peri- and intraoperative care. Then, upon discharge, their providers will see the new EMR-based discharge order set (intervention arm) or not (usual care). The investigators hypothesize that standard discharge medication order sets after surgery will help to optimize opioid prescribing and potentially decrease healthcare utilization in the first 30 days after surgery.

primary_outcome.description: Morphine milligram equivalents in the initial discharge prescription after index surgery

secondary_outcome.description: Morphine milligram equivalents on any additional opioid prescription within 30 days of discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of cases with Phone Calls to Surgery Department
secondary_outcome.description: Phone calls to surgery department within 30 days of discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Cases with Emergency Room Visits
secondary_outcome.description: ER visits within 30 days of discharge

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Cases with Hospital Readmissions to a Surgical Service
secondary_outcome.description: Readmissions to surgical service within 30 days of discharge

arm_group.description: New electronic medical record based discharge medication order set.

intervention.intervention_name: Electronic Medical Record Based Discharge Medication Order Set
intervention.description: New medication discharge order set including recommended opioid quantities, adjunct pain medication

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients
- Aged 18 and over
- Undergo selected general surgical procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- Less than 18 years of age
